author: waredjeb
body:
#### PR description:

This pull request introduces the Sibling Doublets for the HGCal Pattern Recognition. 
This feature has been already discussed in the last Reconstruction and Analysis Tools meeting ([link to presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1095576/contributions/4608272/attachments/2345071/3998685/HGCAL%20Reco%20meeting%20November%202021.pdf), slide 14)
- Some validation plot [here](https://wredjeb.web.cern.ch/HGCAL/SiblingsDoublets/New/D76/), tiny and understood changes in physics
- Timing and memory consumption evaluated on a pileup 200 workflow (34902.999)

### This PR
